name: 許益瑞
objective: The course will be started from the review of senior high school chemistry. Then, the modern quantum chemistry will be introduced to make students familiarized the modern chemistry approach on the interpretation of the physical chemistry phenomena in material and biological science. This includes the introduction to quantum world, Schrodinger equation, chemical bonding, molecular shape and structure and so on. Later, the thermodynamics be applied to the interpretation of  physical and chemical equilibrium, acids and bases, aqueous equilibrium and electrochemistry.

Week 2: Chemical Bonds
Week 3: MOLECULAR SHAPE AND STRUCTURE
Week 4: MOLECULAR SHAPE AND STRUCTURE
Week 5: MOLECULAR SHAPE AND STRUCTURE
Week 6: THE PROPERTIES OF GASES
Week 7: THE PROPERTIES OF GASES
Week 8: LIQUIDS AND SOLIDS
Week 9: LIQUIDS AND SOLIDS
Week 10: INORGANIC MATERIALS
Week 11: The Elements: the d-block
Week 12: Thermodynamics: The First Law
Week 13: Thermodynamics: The 2nd and 3rd Law
Week 14: Thermodynamics: The 2nd and 3rd Law
Week 15: Chemical Equilibria
Week 16: Electrochemistry 
Week 17: Electrochemistry
Week 18: Chemical Kinetics
materials: Textbook : P. Atkins and L. Jones, Chemical Principles, 5th, 2009
